dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2576 RH: To amend title 49, United States Code, to modify requirements relating to the availability of pipeline safety regulatory documents, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Denham (for himself, Ms. Brown of Florida, Mr. Shuster, and Mr. Rahall) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
Reported from the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
The Committee on Energy and Commerce discharged; committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to modify requirements relating to the availability of pipeline safety regulatory documents, and for other purposes.

section.header: Availability of pipeline safety regulatory documents
section.text: Section 60102(p) of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking 1 year and inserting 3 years;
by striking , on an Internet Web site.

endorsement.action-desc: Reported from the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
The Committee on Energy and Commerce discharged; committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
